columns.name: name
columns.description: Specifies the name of the access point.

columns.name: access_point_arn
columns.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the access point.

columns.name: bucket_name
columns.description: The name of the bucket associated with this access point.

columns.name: access_point_policy_is_public
columns.description: Indicates whether this access point policy is public, or not.

columns.name: block_public_acls
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should block public access control lists (ACLs) for buckets in this account.

columns.name: block_public_policy
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should block public bucket policies for buckets in this account.

columns.name: ignore_public_acls
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should ignore public ACLs for buckets in this account.

columns.name: restrict_public_buckets
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should restrict public bucket policies for buckets in this account.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date and time when the specified access point was created.

columns.name: network_origin
columns.description: Indicates whether this access point allows access from the public internet. If VpcConfiguration is specified for this access point, then NetworkOrigin is VPC, and the access point doesn't allow access from the public internet.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Specifies the VPC ID from which the access point will only allow connections.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The access point policy associated with the specified access point.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.
